title: Twitter to charge users for text-message authentication
description: Elon Musk said Twitter was being "scammed" by phone companies over fake authentication-text costs

title: Remote driving in UK from abroad should not be allowed, says Law Commission
description: The Law Commission of England and Wales says remotely driven vehicles are a "legal grey area".

title: Spain to extradite British suspect to US over Twitter hack
description: Joseph O'Connor faces several charges in connection with the hack of more than 130 Twitter accounts.

title: The tech helping people get a better night's sleep
description: Individuals suffering from insomnia are increasingly turning to tech for assistance.
